pitch.cc: Zach Miner went back to the sinker even though Brian Roberts hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Nick Markakis hits a ground-rule double (39) on a line drive to left field. Brian Roberts to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Zach Miner went back to the sinker even though Nick Markakis hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Melvin Mora lines out to shortstop Edgar Renteria.
Zach Miner intentionally walks Aubrey Huff.
Kevin Millar walks. Brian Roberts scores. Nick Markakis to 3rd. Aubrey Huff to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Zach Miner is trying to tie up Kevin Millar with fastballs inside, where Kevin Millar hits .376.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Casey Fossum replaces Zach Miner.

atbat.des: Ramon Hernandez grounds out sharply, pitcher Casey Fossum to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.

pitch.cc: Casey Fossum shows faith in Dane Sardinha by throwing the slider in the dirt.
Casey Fossum battled back from 3-0 to retire Ramon Hernandez.
Casey Fossum is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Dale Scott.

atbat.des: Edgar Renteria singles on a ground ball to left fielder Luke Scott.

action.des: With Ryan Raburn batting, Edgar Renteria steals (4) 2nd base.

pitch.cc: Garrett Olson battled back from 3-0 to retire Ryan Raburn.

atbat.des: Dane Sardinha called out on strikes.

pitch.cc: Garrett Olson has his out pitch working today, recording 4 of his 6 strikeouts with it so far.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson walks. Edgar Renteria to 3rd. Brandon Inge to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Garrett Olson is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball.

atbat.des: Placido Polanco walks. Edgar Renteria scores. Brandon Inge to 3rd. Curtis Granderson to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Garrett Olson went back to the four-seam fastball even though Placido Polanco hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Gary Sheffield singles on a ground ball to left fielder Luke Scott. Brandon Inge scores. Curtis Granderson scores. Placido Polanco to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Garrett Olson; Gary Sheffield is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .878 OPS against them and .728 against everything else.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Alberto Castillo replaces Garrett Olson.

atbat.des: Miguel Cabrera singles on a line drive to left fielder Luke Scott. Placido Polanco scores. Gary Sheffield to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Alberto Castillo went back to the two-seam fastball even though Miguel Cabrera hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Marcus Thames lines out to second baseman Brian Roberts.

pitch.cc: Alberto Castillo is trying to tie up Marcus Thames with fastballs inside, where Marcus Thames hits .346.
Alberto Castillo is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Dale Scott.
